name: Knight Moves - Gambit
description:
2000 words across English, French and Spanish.

13 Categories

If you or your children enjoy word search puzzles, but are looking for a NEW challenge, then Knight Moves is for YOU!


Knight Moves is a cross between word finding and chess moves! Use the knight's moves to find the highlighted words. If you LOVE word finding games, this is a new spin on an old favourite.

Now with Leaderboards, Achievements and ability to challenge your friends (dependent on app store).
